Detailed Description

Base interface for suppliers providing synchrone processing of single object with "pull data" model.

Derivated interfaces should provide access to intern stored produced object for specified object ID. For example image supplier should provide method {const iimg::IBitmap* GetBitmap(const I_DWORD* objectIdPtr) const}. The internal stored object should be created on demand.

CF_SUPPLIER_RESULTS

Definition at line 57 of file ISupplier.h.

enum iproc::ISupplier::WorkStatus
Enumerator:
WS_NONE 

No status is provided, no work was done.

WS_INIT 

New work is initialized.

WS_LOCKED 

Supplier is locked becouse it is doing processing step.

WS_OK 

Work was done correctly and no error occure.

WS_CANCELED 

Work was canceled.

WS_ERROR 

Work was done, but there were errors.

WS_CRITICAL 

Work cannot be done.

virtual void iproc::ISupplier::InvalidateSupplier ( ) [pure virtual]

Called to signalize that this supplier is invalid.

This signal will be transfered to all supplier which are registered as output.
